about_the_game:
Upgrade to the Lord's Edition to bolster your epic adventure into the fantasy world of Antara with digital DLCs.

The King's Bounty II Lord's Edition includes the following content:
• Rod of Deception
• Frosthammer
• Staff of Harmony
• Tyrant's Sword
• Armor of the Hollow
• Heroes & Villains Premium Pack
• King‘s Watchdogs (unit)
